post.body: terrific album. have you heard the demo of all things must pass from the beatles anthology?
aka "the mothership"
williamsburg!
that movie has me craving take-out beer in huge styrofoam cups.
that's my old neighborhood! that's our kickball field! this movie is making me weepy
just look for the irony.
@marklisanti I'm pretty sure that exchange is why god made the internet.
when I read your tweets, I always imagine the voice coming from that tattoo.
that's awesome! a text message with French AND werewolves! Epic.
classic!
what is shocker fitness? swimming in frozen lakes?
I definitely agree with that tegan post from earlier. I just don't think I could pull that off.
it's good to meet you! are you an engineer? what kind of projects are you working on?
Ha! I was definitely thinking more along the lines of Karate Kid: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crane_kick
I'm dubious at best.
is that an australian thing? the crane part?
I don't think un-following is a last is a last resort - it's a natural part of the ebb and flow of the total conversation.
My assault on the grumpy dudes on npr.org has actually elicited a new rule from the management today. http://tinyurl.com/a3ndxf
There's something satisfying about reading the phrase "discredited blowhard" in a NYT house editorial: http://tinyurl.com/a5zyff
The first run of CDs are finally ready to ship! Sweeet.
